title: Accessing fingerprint-secured Apps using faceunlock
content:
Hi folks,

recently I became owner of a Pixel 4. Mit long after that it turned out that I was used to the comfort of a fingerprint-sensor to access multiple apps. As the Pixel 4 lacks this sensor I wonder if there is a way to use the faceunlock as a Fake-Fingerprint without needing the apps to support faceunlock. I found "fingerface", but I don't want to root my phone. Does Google have a workaround maybe?

Greetz
